description: Try our easy to follow Decorated Berries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate-covered fruit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate
name: Decorated Berries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2-4 drops Red, blue or yellow food colouring

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Divide among 4 bowls and add 2-3 drops of food colouring to each bowl to make the colours blue, red, yellow and green (see tip).
Dip 30 large strawberries into coloured chocolate to coat and place on a tray. Refrigerate until set. Transfer remaining chocolate to small piping bags and decorate strawberries as desired.
